content: The Act may be cited as the "One Church, One Child Act of 2004". It includes findings related to the Act. The Congress finds that many States are experiencing shortages of qualified foster and adoptive parents. Additionally, in 2001, only 50,000 children were adopted from foster care, leaving 126,000 children awaiting adoption. The shortage of foster and adoptive parents is a significant issue.
